name: Octopus Forest
description:
Play a short card game with your granddaughter on a long hike.

During summer, I love taking my granddaughter for a hike and picnic, and when we reach a nice spot, we often pause to play our favourite game, Fish & Cards.

game by 

@fffrog3 and @fruit friend🍓

note: this is a very roughly made game with lots of weird edges that might give you splinters. no sound or sound effects, so you can put on your favourite forest playlist while you play :)
